wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Inkersley (born 5 September 1855) was an English journalist and writer active in the United States. He contributed to the Scientific American and other periodicals.

response: Armsby won the Del Monte Cup for Women in 1907, at the site now known as Pebble Beach Golf Links. She also played in the mixed foursomes competition at the event.Arthur Inkersley, "The July 'Golf Week' at Del Monte" Western Field: The Sportsman's Magazine of the West (August 1907): 69. She played at Burlingame in 1912."Sweepstakes Golf at Burlingame" San Francisco Call (July 10, 1912): 10. via Newspapers.com In 1919 she was described as "former holder of the women's golf title of Switzerland.""Boys Beat Girls in Golf Tourney" Sacramento Union (November 29, 1919): 2. via California Digital Newspaper Collection She was still playing golf in 1932, when she won the Scordia Golf Cup in Rome."Miss Armsby Wins in Rome Golf" New York Times (April 5, 1932): 30. via ProQuest
